name: Tophats And Combat
description:
THREE THINGS THAT SUCK

1. Your boss wants you to work on Christmas

2. It's snowing hard and it's freezing cold

3. ...Snowmonsters

They all kind of correlate at the moment, oddly enough...

MERRY CHRISTMAS

NOTE: THIS GAME REQUIRES AN OCULUS HEADSET! IT HAS ONLY BEEN TESTED ON THE ORIGINAL QUEST (STANDALONE AND WITH LINK)!
